text: J&J; Snack Foods is an American manufacturer, marketer, and distributor of name brand snack foods and frozen beverages. It is headquartered in Pennsauken, NJ. Its products includes soft pretzels, frozen beverages, frozen juice treats and desserts, stuffed sandwiches, burritos, churros, fruit pies, funnel cakes, cookies, and bakery goods, and other snack foods and drinks. It was founded in 1971. Category:American food companies Category:1971 establishments in the United States
title: J&J Snack Foods
